text: Alarming report from The Commonwealth Fund: Even with insurance, working-age Americans are grappling with affording healthcare due to skyrocketing premiums, deductibles, and copayments. ðŸš¨ Per the study, over half of working-age Americans struggle to pay for medical expenses. As of 2022, more than 100 million individuals hold debt related to healthcare costs. It's time for a serious conversation on tackling this issue and ensuring accessible, affordable healthcare for all.
